name: Plants Auto Chess
description:
Plants - Insects - War - Legendary units? WE HAVE IT ALL! Controls: Drag and Drop!
  1. Drag Plants to the battlefield and let them fight the evil insects!
  2. Merge Plants of the same kind together to create a stronger one.
  3. Roll your Dice to find better Plants. The higher the better!
Infos:
  • Plants come as commons (1,2,3) rares (4,5) and legendaries (6)
  • You can sell plants in the bin for a good price. 
  • Fullscreenbutton in the lower right corner.

This is the first game, my girlfriend and I created in a collaboration. Full of discussions, creative ideas and laughter.  Enjoy!

Development:  S. Schulte

Lead Artist:  N. Ramscheid
